snippet: The studio said Ms. Rowling would become a screenwriter, working on an adaptation of her “Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them.”
abstract: Warner Brothers concludes deal with J K Rowling that will include new movies, distribution rights to a television mini-series and new theme park attractions; studio made billions from film adaptation of Rowling's Harry Potter series.
lead_paragraph: The studio said Ms. Rowling would become a screenwriter, working on an adaptation of her “Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them.”

headline.main: Warner and J.K. Rowling Reach Wide-Ranging Deal
headline.print_headline: Warner and J.K. Rowling Reach Wide-Ranging Deal

keywords.value: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (Movie)
keywords.name: creative_works
